record.title: FISA AMENDMENTS ACT OF 2007--Continued
record.narrative:
FISA AMENDMENTS ACT OF 2007--Continued -- (Senate - January 24, 2008)

[Page: S302]

speaking.paragraph: What, then, Mr. President, is the pending business?
Mr. President, I have an amendment at the desk to this legislation, and I ask that the clerk report that amendment if it is in keeping with what the Chair suggests.

record.chair: The clerk will report the amendment.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
The Senator from Nevada [Mr. REID] proposes an amendment numbered 3918 to the language proposed to be stricken by amendment No. 3911.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that reading of the amendment be dispensed with.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
Strike all after the first word in the bill and insert the following:
1. EXTENSION OF THE PROTECT AMERICA ACT OF 2007.
Subsection (c) of section 6 of the Protect America Act of 2007 (Public Law 110-55; 121 Stat. 557; 50 U.S.C. 1803 note) is amended by striking "180" in inserting "210".

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I send a cloture motion to the desk.

record.chair: The cloture motion having been presented under rule XXII, the Chair directs the clerk to read the motion.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
We, the undersigned Senators, in accordance with the provisions of rule XXII of the Standing Rules of the Senate, do hereby move to bring to a close debate on the Reid amendment No. 3918 to S. 2248.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the mandatory quorum be waived.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
